cast.name: 尤利娅·别列希尔德 Юлия Пересильд
叶甫盖尼·齐加诺夫 Yevgeni Tsyganov

awards:
第25届上海国际电影节(2023)
　　金爵奖 最佳影片(提名) 奥克萨娜·贝奇科娃

director.name: 奥克萨娜·贝奇科娃 Oksana Bychkova

introduction: Nina is almost 40. She’s attractive and successful: stable marriage, trustful relationship with her husband, little son and favorite job. A call from the past breaks this pleasant stability. Nina's ex-boyfriend Ruslan is seriously ill and asks her to come to Tbilisi to see him, perhaps for the last time. Her husband doesn't mind it, he’s aware of their relationship in the past. Nina goes to the city, where she was happy, to support Ruslan like a friend. She is sure that she loves her husband and that she will return home soon. But this light journey becomes her last one.
